statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={157.5}{e}^{{{0.0432}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0432}}\approx{1.0441467033097}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0441467033097}-{1}={0.044146703309733}\approx{0.0441} and the percent is 4.41.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
